IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDescription: TO BECOME THE LEADING INSTITUTION PRACTICING STRATEGIC PHILANTHROPY AND PROMOTING SOCIAL ENTREPRENEURSHIP TOWARDS A STRONG GLOBAL IRANIAN PRESENCE. PARSA COMMUNITY FOUNDATION INVESTS IN THESE COMMON CAUSES: PRESERVATION OF IRANIAN ARTS AND CULTURE, DEVELOPMENT OF LEADERS THROUGH EDUCATION AND AWARDS SYSTEMS, AND NON-PROFIT CAPACITY BUILDING AND CIVIC ENGAGEMENT.
IRS990.MissionDescription: TO BECOME THE LEADING INSTITUTION PRACTICING STRATEGIC PHILANTHROPY AND PROMOTING SOCIAL ENTREPRENEURSHIP TOWARDS A STRONG GLOBAL IRANIAN PRESCENCE. PARSA COMMUNITY FOUNDATION INVESTS IN THESE COMMON CAUSES: PRESERVATION OF IRANIAN ARTS AND CULTURE, DEVELOPMENT OF LEADERS THROUGH EDUCATION AND AWARDS SYSTEMS, AND NON-PROFIT CAPACITY BUILDING AND CIVIC ENGAGEMENT.
IRS990.Description: PRESERVATION AND ADVANCEMENT OF IRANIAN ARTS AND CULTURE: STIMULATING A DEEP PRIDE FOR OUR HERITAGE AMONGST OUR OWN COMMUNITY AND FOSTERING A POSITIVE IMAGE OF OUR CULTURE AND PEOPLE IN THE UNITED STATES.

Activity2.Description: DEVELOPMENT OF LEADERS THROUGH EDUCATION, AND AWARD SYSTEMS: PREPARING INDIVIDUALS FOR VISIONARY, EFFECTIVE, AND ETHICAL LEADERSHIP THROUGH FELLOWSHIP, AWARDS, AND EDUCATIONAL PROGRAMS TO STRENGTHEN OUR COMMUNITY AND ADVANCE OUR SOCIETY.

Activity3.Description: NON-PROFIT CAPACITY BUILDING AND CIVIC ENGAGEMENT: ENGAGING IN THE SOCIETIES IN WHICH WE LIVE AND COMBINING OUR VOICES TO EFFECT POSITIVE CHANGE FOR THE PERSIAN COMMUNITY AND THE COMMUNITY AT LARGE.

ActivityOther.Description: PROVIDE PRODUCTS AND SERVICES THAT COMMUNITY MEMBERS CAN USE TO INCREASE THEIR ENGAGEMENT IN PHILANTHROPY AND VOLUNTEERISM.

Form990ScheduleDPartXIV.Identifier: DESCRIPTION OF INTENDED USE OF ENDOWMENT FUNDS:
Form990ScheduleDPartXIV.Explanation: THE ENDOWMENT FUND, ALSO CALLED THE MEADOW SOCIAL VENTURE FUND, WAS ESTABLISHED BY THE FOUNDING MEMBERS FOR THE PURPOSE OF FURTHERING THE CHARITABLE AND EDUCATIONAL PURPOSE OF THE FOUNDATION BY PROVIDING A PERMANENT SOURCE OF INCOME FOR THE FOUNDATION. THE CORPUS FUND IS PERMANENTLY RESTRICTED WHILE THE INCOME CAN BE DISTRIBUTED TO OPERATIONS AND OVERHEAD OF THE FOUNDATION AT A RATE OF 3% OF THE TOTAL INVESTED ASSETS (ANNUAL AMOUNT) AS LONG AS THE FAIR VALUE OF THE INVESTED ASSETS IS THE SAME AS OR GREATER THAN THE ORIGINAL INVESTMENT VALUE.

RecipientNameBusiness.BusinessNameLine1: LOS ANGELES COUNTY MUSEUM OF ART (LACMA)
SAN JOSE STATE UNIVERSITY TOWER FOUNDATION
THE UNIVERSITY OF OKLAHOMA FOUNDATION INC
THE REGENTS OF UNIVERSITY OF CALIFORNIA AT BERKELEY
UNIVERSAL LOVE FOUNDATION - HOUSE OF HOPE

Form990ScheduleIPartIV.Identifier: PROCEDURE FOR MONITORING GRANTS IN THE U.S.:
Form990ScheduleIPartIV.Explanation: SCHEDULE I, PART I, LINE 2: PARSA REQUIRES ALL GRANTEES TO PROVIDE NARRATIVE AND FINANCIAL REPORTS OF THE USE OF FUNDS AND PROGRESS OF THE PROJECT TO WHICH THE GRANT WAS AWARDED. REPORTS ARE DUE EVERY SIX MONTHS, TYPICALLY FOR A PERIOD OF ONE YEAR, UNLESS THE GRANT IS AWARDED FOR A LONGER PERIOD OF TIME. GRANTEES ARE REQUIRED TO MAINTAIN SEPARATE ACCOUNTING FOR THE PROJECT TO BE ABLE TO PRODUCE BALANCE SHEETS AND OTHER FINANCIAL REPOTS AT ANY GIVEN TIME PER PARSA'S REQUEST.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: A DRAFT OF THE FORM 990 IS SUBMITTED TO THE AUDIT COMMITTEE FOR REVIEW. THE AUDIT COMMITTEE REVIEWS THE 990 THOROUGHLY AND IN-DEPTH INCLUDING INTERVIEWING THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR AND CONSIDERING THEIR KNOWLEDGE OF THE FOUNDATION AND ITS SUPPORTING INFORMATION.

GeneralExplanation.ReturnReference: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: ALL BOARD MEMBERS ARE REQUIRED TO ANNUALLY SIGN A CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY.

GeneralExplanation.ReturnReference: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: BOARD REVIEWS COMPENSATION AND COMPARES IT TO BUDGETS AND THE FOUNDATION'S INFORMATION. THE BOARD WILL ALSO USE COMPARABILITY BY REVIEWING OTHER FOUNDATION'S COMPENSATIONS.

GeneralExplanation.ReturnReference: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: THE FOUNDATION MAKES ITS GOVERNING DOCUMENTS, CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY, AND FINANCIAL STATEMENTS AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC UPON REQUEST ONLY.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: CHANGES IN NET ASSETS OR FUND BALANCES:
